name: Casa Benigna
review: Casa Benigna and its staff were absolutely wonderful! It was recommended to me by a Madrileño friend as having the best rice, and that was totally accurate..... EAT HERE IMMEDIATELY! I cannot recommend this quaint restaurant enough!The staff is amazing, caring and genuine. Impeccable service. They treat you like.... Great food and outstanding service-good interiors My husband and i came for pre birthday dinner and not only enjoyed the food but the owners were so....

name: El Paraguas
address: Calle de Jorge Juan, 16, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review: The restaurant offers an elegant and formal ambience with a great atmosphere and professional and customer service driven professionals in the food.... I would highly discourage anyone from eating at El Paraguas while visiting Madrid, despite the oddly high ratings. Clearly the customers who have reviewed.... Tiene trenta minutos Para conseguir agua...servicio muy mal,  comida nada especial y cara. Buenos noches!! Nunca volver..

name: The Knife
review:
On our 2nd to last night on Madrid, we found ourselves at the Knife. Why did we wait so long???

Everything about the place was wonderful. We arrived early.... The Knife was a nice treat. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The meat was outstanding and I definitely had my fill! They had everything under the.... So now I've finally been to this location. Did I mention this restaurant is my most favourite restaurant ever??? Imagine my surprise to find they have a....

name: Tandoori Station
address: Calle de José Ortega y Gasset, 89- 91, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Lets start with - you need reservation. If u do not have one, you will need to wait till 11:30 or so to get in. This place serves individulized Indian food,.... Very good Indian food and service  in a lovely little restaurant.  Pretty expensive which is factored in my rating. We enjoyed our chicken tikka masala and.... Great food and service. As spicy as you want it. Always worth a visit if you can get a reservation..

name: La Tasqueria
address: Calle Duque de Sesto, 48, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: This is definitely my favorite restaurant in Madrid, they are wild enough to make anything into best food, and the sauces they make are so creative ! Every.... Like Brad M., my boyfriend and I also decided to make this our last meal in Spain.  After two weeks roaming around this lovely country, we decided to end.... To our surprise we were able to get last-minute reservations to this place on a Friday night for our last dinner in Spain.  We wanted to make sure it was....

name: Mad Brewing
review: I need to give credit where credit is due. Mad(drid) Brewing has an excellent Imperial IPA. Maybe it's because I'd been walking all day, or because I hadn't.... Delicious beer, friendly & patient staff (our Español is atrocious). We had nachos, vegan burger, brisket (recommended by staff) and a few other items - all.... Quite surprising to find a quality Brewery in Madrid. Excellent food and warm atmosphere!! I will return .Que bueno !.

name: Cañadío
address: Calle del Conde de Peñalver, 86, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
A gem in the non touristic neighborhood!

On my last day during a 3 week vacation to Spain, found this splendid restaurant near my hotel. After a day trip.... Very nice outdoor space friendly staff ask for English menu as no one spoke great English. Fresh anchovies are the best and they say they have the best.... SUMMARY: Eat here. You won't regret it. Downstairs tapas and drinks. Upstairs - upscale dining. Prepare to pay appropriately. 

FOOD: 5 stars - MUST EATS -....

name: Docamar
review: Great place for tapas and drinks even if you don't drink alcohol. Helpful staff, they are open late too. The homies and I walked around that place in the.... It took me forever to find this place. Granted I was working off screenshots of Google Maps because I couldn't get data on my phone, and I tend to get lost..... The service is the best I have had in a LONG time.  Friendly, talkative, honest suggestions and so on. They brought us free snacks to taste, multiple....

name: Los Montes de Galicia
review: This was.,  no comparison, the best restaurant we came across in Madrid.   The food was WONDERFUL.  They GAVE us two Tapas prior to our meal.  Then, we had.... This restaurant was recommended to me by someone back in America.   The reviews were wonderful, so we gave it a try-   It lived up to it's reputation-.... Truly one of the best meals of my life here. We were treated like superstars and everything was incredible. This restaurant was listed as #2 among all....

name: El Güero
review:
We love this place, and come for work lunches all the time. Excellent Venezuelan and Mexican. Everything we've had has been nice but.... Antonio was great. My friends and I came in late tonight to find a table and the place was (predictably) packed. There was no possible way for them to get a.... Excellent service in a small restaurant with about 12 tables in a quiet neighborhood. 
Food is delicious and the service is very friendly and fast. There....

name: LA VACA
address: Calle Torrecilla del Puerto, 5, 28043 Madrid, Spain
review: I had to make sure that La Vaca Argentina is now just La Vaca. I think they had a renovation and made the place look a lot more airy and woody. Went there....

name: Goiko Grill
address: Calle Conde de Peñalver, 41, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Terrible.  They served raw burgers, not rare, blue.  After taking them back to our hotel and figuring out the quality issue, we returned to fix the error,.... Muy buenas hamburguesas. De las mejores que he comido en estos años. La carne es muy buena, las patatas increíbles (muchos restaurantes las dejan un poco.... Mac and cheese balls were unreal, the burger was great as well however i asked for well done and found the burger to be very pink..

name: La Tagliatella
review: Stopped by this restaurant after passing by Geno's. So glad we did. I had the lasagna and my husband had the risotto with prawns.  It was so delicious.. It was great experience! My husband and I had late dinner here, we were very hungry. Food was soooo delicious, it was probably the best pasta that we had!.... Excellent! Wait staff was extremely friendly, professional, and accomodating. Food was very good, especially the chocolate truffles..

name: O'Caldiño
review:
This is a high end Spanish seafood restaurant. You will walk away knowing that you have eaten well both via your stomach and your wallet. 

The food is.... Located on a quieter street, this was a great find on a Saturday night.  We took our waiter Adrian's suggestion and ordered the steamed clams. They were.... Overpriced and mediocre.  Waiter suggested peppers and cheese.  26 euros for food I could make at home.  Fish was with a heavy lemon cream sauce...not food.....

name: Bendita Locura
address: Calle del Príncipe de Vergara, 73, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
Looks good but my advice- get reservations.
It was packed so likely it's good but we didn't have reservations so we left- making a reservation for tomorrow.... During a recent visit to Madrid my family and I dined discovered this gem across the street from our hotel. We dined at Bendita Locura on a couple of days..... Brunch is served from 10:00 am. That is the best option. Good eggs Benedictine. And service was very good.

name: El Bund
address: Calle de Arturo Baldasano, 22, 28043 Madrid, Spain
review: My friend and I are Chinese tourists from London.although this place is a little far away from central Madrid ,but the dishes are worth it! We sit outside.... Delicious home made dim sum!! It's just a little bit too pricey and the wait for the food to be served is too long... But the taste, it's definitely not a.... We had a set menu for two people and a cup of tea which costed us 70 euros... The decoration was amazing and surprised me a little bit.  The food is....

name: El Gran Barril
review:
For seafood lovers, El Gran Barril is a place to schedule in your foodie agenda while in Madrid.  

Located near the Goya station, it is easy to get to..... Food was great. It's a block away from our hotel . Service was good. Our waiter was attentive but had a little trouble understanding us, so we got shrimp.... All the dishes were prepared very well.
Contemporary and blight ambiance and well trained staff, very professional and helpful! 
Plus quality wine listings.....

name: China Te
address: Calle de Santa Hortensia, 60, 28002 Madrid, Spain
review:
A very elegant Chinese restaurant, that has a superb staff and very good food.

China Te is a beautifully decorated restaurant, you can tell they pride.... Great lunch time menu for a good price. You only pay 10,30eur and you eat way too much! 
The choices are many and it includes a first, second, third,....

name: Swagat
address: Calle de Nuñez de Balboa, 29, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
Returning to this restaurant from about two Years ago, this place reminded me of the warmth and delicacy I tasted last time. Given that I was in town for a.... Don't miss this place if you love Indian food. From menu of the day lunch special, the service is very friendly and inviting and the kitchen puts a little.... This was one of the best indian food that I had in Spain across outside of Barcelona. 

We tried 2 dishes, Baigan Achari and Paneer Haryali. Both were good....

name: La Maruca
review:
As vegetarians, our meal was amazing. 

The highlights:
- The mushroom tortilla 
- The cheese and tomato salad
- The cheese and honey flan

Simple.... Wow. Amazing. Easily the best meal I had in Madrid. Almost lost a star for the server who took our drink order and brought water. Not sure what the attitude.... We came here on a friends recommendation and I am glad we did.  This was without a doubt my favorite meal in Madrid. It is located in a pretty upscale....

name: VIPS
address: Calle de la Condesa de Venadito, 5, 28027 Madrid, Spain

name: Peggy Sue's
review: On our last day in Salamanca, we decided to eat American food in Spain and BOY WAS IT DELICIOUS!!!!  I was hesitant about the food and so only ordered....

name: El Pimiento Verde
review:
Impressed by this place! Since we got there, and please make reservations, we were well taken care of.
I want a special thanks to Manuel the  "manager" that.... Food was excellent.  The artichokes and white asparagus appetizers were absolutely divine and the lobster risotto was well done too though I could have done.... The homemade croquettes was delicious 
The grilled octopus was perfect and soft 
The bread and ceviche was delicious 
The receptionist and the waiter was....

name: Casa Lobo
address: Calle Torrecilla del Puerto, 5, 28043 Madrid, Spain

name: Betelu
address: Calle de Florencio Llorente, 27, 28027 Madrid, Spain
review: We came because of the reviews and we wanted seafood.  The restaurant had nothing but fish... not the same a seafood.  A large menu but only a few items.... Make reservations before you go!!!! This place was recommended to me by a coworker from Spain. This is a hidden gem! They are best known for their fish. For.... Best fish in town cooked in simple and tasty Navarran style. Very good wine list. Family owned and managed. Tasty home made desserts..

name: Lateral
review:
This is a great spot to grab dinner or tapas. From the pinchos to the actual entrees, it's all good. Also, the menu is very diverse. It's so diverse that.... Super cute, good service and cool outdoor seating. We ordered a few different plates to share and they were all really really great. Favorite by far was the.... Very good adresse in Madrid!
Lots of choices you can share.
Prices are affordable approximately 20€ per person without alcohol 
Loved the burata, the....

name: El Rinconcito de Juan
review: Love the huevos rotos con queso azul here; it's great on a chilly night.. Came here because I was at the Bernebeu for a match and didn't want to stay in the area. The food is good, the staff is great and friendly. Try the Tacos de....

name: Purnima
review:
Lovely decor,  good service and flavorful fresh food .  We had ordered vegetarian dishes and all were delicious .  Enjoyed the vermouth as well .  We had.... We made an online reservation. The food is very good and the service is acceptable. Decor is acceptable. I was happy to hear Bollywood music after a long.... So the stars are for its to the point service where they didn't leave us stranded. 
We never ate at this restaurant as it was under renovation. They picked....

name: Cazorla
review: I just went to this restaurant and the service was really good. It's a perfect restaurant for typical Spanish food, specially for someone visiting. We order.... My fave neighborhood bar--I love it. The staff was immediately warm and friendly when I moved in, they were patient with my Spanish, and made me feel at.... Excellent tapas place, tight space, great food and very friendly service! The owner is very helpful and knowledgeable..

name: La Gran Pulpería
review: Attending a conference in Madrid.  A local pointed me to this restaurant and well-deserving of its high ratings on Yelp.  Fresh seafood and great ambiance..... This is one of my favorite octopus restaurants and it always has a very energized atmosphere with locals chatting it up. You could step right up to the bar.... Elegant smoking and seafood dining establishment in Madrid. If you eat seafood and smoke cigarettes, then you might  enjoy this restaurant. I found this....

name: Estay
review: This is the best place to have authentic Spanish food in Madrid! I wanted to experience traditional Spanish food and was not disappointed. My friends and I.... Best place in Madrid when it comes to tapas! Worth ordering the steak tartare, "delicias de algas", or any other main dish from their menu! It's located in.... A family friend brought us here for late night tapas.  She speaks perfect Spanish, so she was able to convey my vegan-ness to the waiter.  There's nothing....

name: El Rincon de Jaén
address: Calle de Don Ramón de la Cruz, 88, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
4 Americans walk into a bar...

We were in Madrid on holiday and one of the neighbors at our Airbnb recommended this little gem nearby. From the outside, it.... The tapas keep coming as long as you have a drink in front of you. It's a very small place but clean and the service is very good.. An excellent place to get cramped and loud with your buddies. It's two places on the corner of each other. Usually hard to find sit down spots, just talk to....

name: Punto MX
address: Calle del General Pardiñas, 40, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
We had a really unique experience, no menu per se, but a chef flown in from a small town in Mexico was in residence for a week or so and had a full menu.... Very disappointing food and service. It took more than 15 minutes to bring our drink order and we had to remind them to bring it.

Ordering the food was.... Good food but simple taco at ten times normal price is outlandish.  Margarita for 13 euros total ripoff. Get slightly better pricing and I am happy to return.

name: Tablao Flamenco La Quimera
review: Wonderful experience.  Very intimate place with excellent show enjoyed it immensely.  Performance is about an hour.  So glad we decided to visit.. A fantastic and intimate experience and venue a bit outside central Madrid, Tablao features incredibly intense flamenco performers who are at the peak of.... I'm so glad a friend recommended this spot to me. The location is a little on the outskirts of the main area of tourists but it's still easy to get to by....

name: Álbora
address: Calle de Jorge Juan, 33, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review: Really great place to have dinner. The service is great. Their amuse bouche are super delicious. The potato pockets served with entrees are also great.. Has the short tasting menu with wine pairings for lunch. Great service and interesting food. Some we're definitely tastier than others. Overall a good.... #Michelin #onestar #Madrid #Spain We had a dinner here. Clean and romantic bar and atmosphere. Not bad service. Well the food was just okay. Especially....

name: El Fogón de Trifón
review: Came here because I saw the network TV series "From Spain with Love" with Annie Sibonney where she introduced some of the specialties of the restaurants.... Service was great! We did not make reservations and came right when it opened. The front said they would not be able to accommodate us but one of the.... amazing restaurant, great food and a lovely atmosphere.Really worth a visit!.

name: La Cuchara
address: Calle del Conde de Peñalver, 82, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Found this restaurant on Yelp! and tried it with a friend 3 months ago. Loved the fact that i could save a table on their website since I don't speak.... This Venezuelan place is sooooo good. One of the waiters used to live in Brooklyn and is super helpful with non Spanish speaking people. Empanadas de cazón.... Cool place with a cool atmosphere. Randomly just walked in cause it looked cute and it had the best sangria I have ever had..

name: La Manduca
review: If I could give 10 stars to a bar (it's a restaurant but in Spain it goes as bar), this would be the place. It's the most authentic place you could eat some.... Total locals spot and for a reason. This place has great food and drinks. Since I'm from the USA I'm not used to having people smoke while eating but if you.... 4 for taste, 2 stars for presentation. Good place for a quick drink and bite but not exactly a place you would bring a date..

name: Kabuki Wellington
review:
One of the best Sushi I have ever had. 

Expensive but absolutely worth it! 

The Tuna with tomato and bread is to die for !. Visited here on a Michelin star tour and loved it. The food was everything! The vibe was sexy, modern and exclusive. I'd definitely return here.. I loved everything about this place! From the decor to the food to the service, everything was impeccable. However, it is on the pricer side. I wouldn't say....

name: La Trainera
review:
One of my biggest regrets is not coming back one more time before we left Madrid. 

I came here about 13 years ago and I remember the crab being AMAZING. I.... Not the best seafood restaurant . 
Service is not very satisfactory . Not a single smiley face from any staff member !. A very good fish restaurant in Madrid. Simple fish, without too much show and complicated dishes. Expensive, but high quality and consistent. 

There are....

name: Pappone
address: Calle de la Condesa de Venadito, 12, 28027 Madrid, Spain
review: I've been to Italy and this quaint corner restaurant just took me back space and time travel to Italy! It really took me by surprise on how authentic the....

name: Sapama
address: Calle de José del Hierro, 60, 28027 Madrid, Spain

name: La Canica
address: Avenida de los Andes, 25, 28043 Madrid, Spain
review:
La Canica had the best food we ate during our 9 days driving around Andalusia & Madrid, and that is saying something.
The artichoke hearts roasted w/olive.... The reason for going to this restaurant was to attend a meeting. It is near the airport. The service is a little slow.  To start we had flat bread with.... This is a great restaurant! Isidro the waiter suggested something for us to drink and eat and let me tell you what we got was delicious!!!!!  Lomo grilled ,....

name: Goiko Grill
review:
Finally a place in Madrid with salt and seasoning on their burgers and fries.

The food is really good here. It is definitely a go to if you're in Madrid.. It is twice as thick as the "napkin plus" of "Brooklyn Burger", the best hamburger in Korea.
Adding mushrooms to a kevin set is the best combination.
I can.... This is a great spot for a burger. Finding good food in Madrid was a challenge for me. This spot will not disappoint..

name: Casa Dani
review:
We saw this place on Somebody Feed Phil where the tortillas are supposed to be really good, and they ARE. We got it with onion because that's the version.... Overall: come for the tortilla dubbed "best in Madrid" by Jose Andres, but understand it might come at a price as this place is SUPER popular and it might.... Oh my Gosh! This place is amazing. My wife and I were on vacation in Madrid and saw this place on Somebody Feed Phil on Netflix. You have to go here.

They....

name: La Vegana
review: This place you will get quite good serivce, and prices are ok but the quality of food is not the best. I need to improve a lot. I ordered some food and the....

name: Ultramarinos Quintín
address: Calle de Jorge Juan, 17, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review: The food was remarkable. I had the seafood salad and the spider crab cannelloni. They were refreshing and the dishes were just the right amount. I would.... No words to describe how good everything was; I had the palmetto salad, the chipirones and torrejas for dessert and enjoyed it all. 4.1 What a superb location, decor, and overall atmosphere. The interiors are stunning, literally all floors. The food is good too. Coffee tastes great! We....
